description: Detects direct access to raw pastes in different paste services often used by malware in their second stages to download malicious code in encrypted or encoded form Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: User activity (e.g. developer that shared and copied code snippets and used the raw link instead of just copy & paste)
name: Raw Paste Service Access
